website_summaries.verdict: Sperry comes back with a long-awaited mule version, the Crest Mule, which has now gathered heaps of praises for its timeless style and consistent level of quality and comfort. Most of those who grabbed a pair were so satisfied with their purchase that they expressed wanting to buy more.The Sperry Crest Mule is an excellent showcase from a widely respected classic brand, with all its impressive features coming at a budget-friendly price.
pros: The Sperry Crest Mule's phenomenal comfort has earned many glowing praises from its wearers
More than a handful of buyers consider the budget-friendly mule sneaker as a highly recommended purchase
An overwhelming majority of ladies love the Sperry Crest Mule’s cute yet classic styling
Some shoppers have grown so fond of the classic-looking colorways that they felt ordered extra pairs
The Sperry Crest Mule sneakers are of high quality, per a good number of reviews
Plenty of users are delighted with the mule sneaker’s on-and-off ease, which made it their go-to pair for everyday use
Several users say that the mule sneaker is perfect for long walks and sightseeings
One fashion-conscious user has remarked that the finished rawhide laces gave the mule sneaker an elegant, classy style, which allowed her to dress the pair with almost anything casual
cons: A Sperry fanatic, who owned many of the brand’s white shoes, got disappointed with the Crest Mule’s “white” color, which to her looked more of cream instead of actual white
One tester has noted that the Sperry Crest Mule felt a little stiff throughout the first week of wearing it
The mule sneaker does not have much arch support, one user has pointed out

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Comfy but runs really small. I’m a true size 5.5 but I usually get a size 6 for a little extra room but with this size 6 my heel sticks out.
customer_reviews.author: Parrot

customer_reviews.title: Little loose but still great!
customer_reviews.text: It is very stylish very pretty footwear that goes with ankle length jeans light blue color. Absolutely love it. The only negative I can see is it is kind of loose and I will have to work with the lace to tighten it which could be a little bit of a challenge. I’ll keep you posted How that goes.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Alittle too roomy in the heel for me
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a really Fun stylish mule sneaker. It did run a bit wide in the heel where my foot moved as I was walking. I was buying for ship excursions and it would not work for a lot of walking. I regretfully had to return...... I was really hoping they would fit since I they are the cutest ones I Ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: I like slides so I avoid tying and re-tying and these are perfect. They feel good and look good.
customer_reviews.author: Binks

customer_reviews.title: Nice mule sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is as expected. Wish the leather laces could be adjusted a little to loosen the fit across the instep. Otherwise, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Gullo

customer_reviews.title: Love this traditional look in a mule.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the 10 for 9.5 and then also re-tie the barrel laces to tighten them. (YouTube for easy directions if you’ve never done it)
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Q

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I have been looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and a nice look. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Cutest shoes I have ever owned! Trendy, durable and not cheap looking
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is a favorite. I want in more colors
customer_reviews.author: Sharks

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe
customer_reviews.text: when the shoes first arrived I thought they might be too small or a little too tight but just a little bit of wearing them molds them to your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Rassa

customer_reviews.title: Wearing toe socks would be a good thing
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the knots loosen up and you feel like the shoes are going to fall off
customer_reviews.author: gloria

customer_reviews.title: Sporty and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. Sporty and comfortable. It was difficult to find a mule sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: KY Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these Inordwred the blue and gray too! Comfy easy to wear
customer_reviews.author: diane l.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this shoe. I can’t believe anyone thinks they are comfortable! The insides hurt your bare feet, the sole is hard as a rock and doesn’t more with your foot. The laces are just decorative and you can’t get the shoe to stay on. The concept is cute and I love slides, but you can’t walk more than a few steps with out your feet hurting.
customer_reviews.author: N. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Runs small. Get 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.text: I have regular Sperry and thought these open heel would be similar in length especially since it's open heel. Disappointed that it runs 1/2 size small. The actual canvass is good. Looks and feels sturdy. The best part is the comfy memory foam insole. That's the biggest change from the classic Sperry shoes I've known. The barrel laces are a nice finishing touch and made from genuine rawhide. Too bad they aren't consistent in sizing.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ocampo

customer_reviews.title: Cute + comfy foam sole + true to size!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute take on a classic Sperry! The backless design is easy peasy, the foam footbed is comfy squishy, & the off white color is a great neutral: WIN! The size 8 fits her size 8 foot perfectly, so is true to size. Great shoe to keep by the door & slide on quickly. It's a pricier sneaker than some, but Sperrys last - I've had a pair of Sperry boat shoes for 20 years. (Thanks for reading this & hope it's Helpful!)
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: It’s got good details and well made. It is exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Jong Lee

product_meta.title: Sperry Top-Sider Crest Mule Sneaker Women's
feature_bullets: Lightweight and breathable canvas uppers in classic core colors with genuine rawhide laces and barrel ties for easy on/off and a secure fit memory foam insole provides all-day comfort, and a flexible non-marking rubber outsole.
